entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 06:56 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
